Reviews.Title: Save your money ~ crap
Reviews.Author: Luvs2bake
Reviews.Content: This camera was given to me for Christmas.  I have used it only a few times.  In those few times, the flash has gotten stuck in the off mode.  My husband who is very good with electronics, etc can not figure out what is wrong with it.  While messing trying to get the flash back on I have now gotten it stuck in the video camera mode and can't change that now either.  I realize this wasn't an expensive camera but this is ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: sanyo canera
Reviews.Author: gennady  kaganovsky
Reviews.Content: Not in working condition.big delay between shooting pictures.used to have the sane camera that worked very  thats ehy i got the same one to replace only this one is not working.very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: The Sanyo Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lee Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I bought it to replace one that was broke for my daughter, she says it takes better pictures then the one that got broke, I was very happy with my purchase and the way it was handled, thank you
